Name: AI Virtual Assistant
Description: An enterprise-grade HR support tool designed to reduce manual inquiries and streamline employee self-service. Leveraging LLM and AI-driven automation, it cut inbound HR case volume by 25%, improved adoption by 70%, and generated $10M in annual cost savings, while enhancing compliance and operational efficiency across 180 hospitals.
Key skills: Business case, agile, backlog building, ecosystem development, roadmapping, user journeys

Name: Onboarding Platform
Description: Conducted extensive user research and usability testing to create a user-friendly interface for tracking patient health metrics and managing appointments.
Key skills: Scrum, UX research, platform development, roadmapping, usability testing, user journeys

Name: LLM proctored Job Description Generator
Description: An AI-driven tool that automates creation of compliant, role-specific job descriptions across 16+ divisions, reducing creation time by 90% and accelerating high-volume hiring pipelines by 20% for 600+ HR partners.
Key skills: Data analysis, Python, Scrum, UX research, agile, backlog building, product management, product ownership, usability testing, user journeys

Name: Retention Tracker
Description: Developed a Retention Tracker rolled out to 16+ divisions, standardizing 25+ milestones and reducing early-tenure attrition by 22% to preserve talent investment, while offering real-time engagement insights to frontline stakeholders.
Key skills: Customer research, Data analysis, agile, backlog building, product ownership, roadmapping, usability testing, user journeys
